name: Please, Peace! / Paz, por favor!
description:
everybody can change and please, make riots, fight and scream for a good future!
.
Listen Racionais MC's the album "Sobrevivendo no Inferno"
.
FUCK FACISTS, cry, cry and cry more for some days...But today I decided change my shit perspective.If you are a black people, poor or 157 people, SAY FUCK CAPITALISM! 

5000x5000 pixels and totally inspired in Akira Kurosawa
